name: Playground warriors
description:
Do you also hate bullies. Can't you also stand it how they act towards people. I think you probably do. So here, Playground warriors. The game where you can beat up as many bullies that you can handle. 

How to play:
Bullies are coming at you to beat you up but they deserve a punch to. So beat them up instat. By beating the bullies you will get points. With those point you will be able to open up playground some more. 

Controls: 
W = Move fowards
A   = Move left
S    = Move backwards
D   = Move right

Left Mouse button = Attack
